data.title: Death of Prince Constantin
data.meta_description: Prince Constantin, Son of Prince Hans-Adam II. has died yesterday...
data.text:

Prince Constantin, Son of Prince Hans-Adam II. has died yesterday.

https://www.vaterland.li/liechtenstein/gesellschaft/prinz-constantin-ist-verstorben-art-551264

Blog Real

Imperial Majesty

Joined

Jan 9, 2013

Messages

13,446

City

Lisboa

Country

Portugal

What a shock. He died unexpectedly yesterday. How sad for Prince Hans-Adam to watch his son die. RIP

Official statement from the Princely Family:

The Princely House regrets to announce that HSH Prince Constantin of Liechtenstein died unexpectedly on December 5, 2023. Prince Constantin was the youngest son of Prince Hans-Adam II. He leaves behind his wife, Princess Marie of Liechtenstein, née Countess Kálnoky of Kőröspatak, and his children Prince Moritz, Princess Georgina and Prince Benedikt.

Prince Constantin was chairman of the supervisory board of Liechtenstein Group AG and a member of Board of Directors of Liechtenstein Group Holding AG.

Vaduz Castle, December 6, 2023

https://fuerstenhaus.li/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/MM_Prinz-Constantin_20231206_FINAL.pdf

After the state parliament observed a minute of silence in today's session, apostolic administrator Benno Elbs sent words of mourning to the family and population:

“It was with great sadness that I learned today of the death of HSH Prince Constantin of Liechtenstein. On behalf of the Archdiocese of Vaduz, I would like to express my most sincere condolences to HSH Prince Hans-Adam II, the deceased's wife Princess Marie and their children Prince Moritz, Princess Georgina and Prince Benedikt. I join them and the entire royal family in mourning and praying for the deceased.

This afternoon, at 3 pm, the bells rang in all the parish churches in the archdiocese. I invite all believers of the Principality to join in prayer for Prince Constantin and thus express their solidarity with the Princely House. I wish Prince Hans-Adam II, Princess Marie, the children and all who mourn the deceased much strength and comfort in the hope of the resurrection. You can feel supported by the many people who pray for the deceased across the principality. God grant Prince Constantin eternal rest."

https://www.vaterland.li/liechtenstein/gesellschaft/prinz-constantin-ist-verstorben-art-551264

Princess Astrid, wife of Prince Alexander (son of Prince Philipp and Princess Isabelle) reacted via her Instagram page to the unexpected death of Prince Constantin:

I usually never post when there is a death because I believe whoever leaves us still continues to live with us in our memory and our prayers and our thoughts . But Constantin our dear Tino needs to be mentioned as he is gone much to soon and much too quick and leaves behind a huge whole in the hearts of his family . My husband Alexander and Tino are the same age and it makes you realize how quickly it can all end and how much we have to appreciate our loved ones as long that are with us . I am beyond sad for Marie his wife and her children . There are no words for my sadness and I wish we as a family can console them as good as possible but a loss of this grandeur is not consolable . Please pray for us as a family and for the world to have some peace and kindness in this sad sad times .

https://www.instagram.com/p/C0hPN2GNacNua9M5BaEaHiriWru4-2YHN5icYE0/?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA== (It's private only those who follow her can see the post)

Electronic book of condolences for the late Prince Constantin:

The unexpected death of Prince Constantin caused deep sadness and consternation among the population. The government has therefore created an electronic condolence book.

The book of condolences can be accessed at www.kondolenzbuch.li and is now available for registration.

https://www.vaterland.li/liechtenst...fuer-verstorbenen-prinz-constantin-art-551387

The website for the online guest book unfortunately has not been working since the beginning.

It's a eerily sad that the same thing happened a generation ago. So history has regrettably repeated itself. Two years after the Fürstin dies, the youngest son of the family shockingly and unexpectedly passes away.

Princess Gina dies in 1989

Prince Wenzel dies in 1991 unexpectedly of unknown causes

Princess Marie dies in 2021

Prince Constantin dies in 2023 unexpectedly of unknown causes
